Title: Supranational
Description: The location scope is a supranational region or continent.

Title: National
Description: The activity scope covers a country, as defined by ISO 3166.

Title: Subnational region
Description: The activity scope covers a first-level subnational administrative area.

Title: Local authority
Description: The activity scope covers a second-level subnational administrative area.

Title: Local area
Description: Location scope covers a small area.
